directions: Place potatoes and lemon juice in a large saucepan, and add enough water to cover. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, and cook until tender, about 15 minutes.

Drain water from potatoes, and use a potato masher to mash. Stir in egg white and butter, and gradually mix in the half-and-half using the masher. Use more or less cream to reach your desired consistency. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 2 1/2 pounds russet potatoes, peeled and cubed
salt and black pepper to taste
title: Momma's Mashed Potatoes
